self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes his style is dangerous for Dave and that he has improved significantly over the past year. He is confident in his wrist and pronation strength.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes thinks his style is dangerous for Dave, especially in the grip and pronation.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Super strong, especially in the hook and defensive positions.
Dave Chaffee.health: Dave mentioned some elbow issues but feels good for the match.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave has been active in high-level matches this year, showing endurance and adaptability.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Prudnik will win the first two rounds but Devon's endurance will prevail in the later rounds.

Devon Larratt.strength: Incredible endurance and smart on the table.
Devon Larratt.health: Devon is prepared and ready despite recent surgeries.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has been training intensely and is known for his endurance.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Explosive and strong in both hook and top roll.
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Prudnik has shown dominance in recent matches, including a strong win over Todd Hutchings.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Matt Mask is very dangerous in the setup and has a strong pronation.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Matt's aggressive setup vs Sandris's endurance.

Matt Mask.strength: Super strong in pronation and setup.
Matt Mask.previous_match_summary: Matt has been looking monstrous in recent training videos.

Sandris Sedis.previous_match_summary: Sandris recently won the WAF title, showing great endurance.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Dave is confident he will win, citing his experience and recent improvements. He believes the match will go differently than Ermes expects.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Dave's power and experience vs Ermes's youth and improvement.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Young, improving, and confident in his wrist and pronation.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has not pulled right arm matches since early 2022, making his current level a question mark.
